items.sentence: How many post offices do you think there are in Boston?
We should take off our shoes before entering the house.
Tom didn't read any of the messages that Mary sent him.
Did Tom say when he was going to come back from Boston?
I can drive to Boston and back on one tank of gasoline.
Why do you think Tom is reluctant to go hiking with us?
I tried doing that, but unfortunately I wasn't able to.
Here is one of your gloves. I can't find the other one.
I think that you sent that message to the wrong person.
Do you really think that one of our employees stole it?
